::Composer/Surgital::

    Composer does a few acrobatic moves in the air a=
nd dodges both of the lazer shots from Autofire.  Composer looked at the ge=
stalt.  He fired 2 plasma shots at Surgital's forehead.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    Surgital quickly sees the missiles and charges=
 from the Galactor jets coming at him, and puts the arm that is Explobody i=
n front of him to block, as Explobody was the most durable Bodicon.  Surgit=
al's arm takes the damage, and takes it pretty badly, but is still intact a=
nd functional.  Then, out of nowhere, Surgital is hit dead on in the forehe=
ad by plasma shots, and stumbles back, then his gigantic body falls backwar=
ds down on the CF.

    "YOUCH!" Surgital yelped in pain, pulling his body =
back up onto its feet and vigorously rubbing his back.

    "Decepticons, I=
 say we work on their shields!  But first, revenge!" Surgital's voice boome=
d over the battlefield.

    Surgital lifted up the leg that was Legtrap, t=
hen bent it so his knee was "aiming" at Composer.  Then, his knee plate ope=
ned up and fired out a big, energon net at Composer.  He then stomped his f=
oot back on the ground.  Surgital's hand converted into a spinning saw blad=
e again and he turned around and attempted to cut one or both of the Galact=
or jets.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
     Composer got caug=
ht in the massive net.  When it wrapped around his body, it brought him dow=
n to the ground like a rock.  He struggled to get out.  The net was made of=
 energon, and everytime he touched it he was being exposed to high levels o=
f energon which was over the safety limit.

     "Wheeljack!  Somebody!  Ge=
mme outta here!" Composer cried for help.
